name: New Content Creation Assistance
description: Provide guidance and automation when new content is created

triggers.message:
A new infrastructure folder was created at {filePath}. I can help you:
1. Generate a README.md using the appropriate template
2. Create a basic folder structure for this Azure service
3. Suggest blog articles that might relate to this implementation
4. Set up parameter file templates
5. Add entry to BLOG-TO-CODE-MAPPING.md if connected to existing content

A new scripts folder was created at {filePath}. I can help you:
1. Set up the folder structure (powershell/, python/, etc.)
2. Create README.md with script documentation standards
3. Suggest blog articles that might relate to these scripts
4. Provide script templates with proper headers and error handling

A new Bicep template was created at {filePath}. Let me help you:
1. Generate a comprehensive README.md using the Bicep template
2. Create a matching .parameters.json file with placeholder values
3. Suggest blog articles from Technical Anxiety that relate to this implementation
4. Recommend related templates and scripts in the repository
5. Add appropriate entry to BLOG-TO-CODE-MAPPING.md
